oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Commission for Richard Cross Gordon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Commission for Richard Cross Gordon, signed by Governor Isham Harris. Gordon was born on February 25, 1837, and died on April 18, 1903. He was a Second Lieutenant in the 11th Tennessee Infantry and was from Hickman County, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
